name: Reason for testing
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="testing_reason"
	label="Reason for testing"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_testing_reason"
	sql_title_column="name"
	sql_title_key="guid"
	urlSelect="index.php?option=com_###component###&view=testing_reasons&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=testing_reason.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=testing_reason.edit&guid={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	titleSelect="Select Reason for testing"
	titleNew="New Reason for testing"
	titleEdit="Edit Reason for testing"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="true"
	edit="true"
	clear="true"
	class="input-large"
	description="The reason for testing"
	hint="Select a Reason for testing"
/>
